title: Glazed pork chops with stuffing
ingredients: ['1/2 tablespoon butter', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '1 small onion, chopped', '15 slices day-old bread, torn into small pieces', '1/2 tablespoon dried Italian herbs', '450ml chicken stock, made with a stock cube', '6 pork chops', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '110g butter, melted']
